scripts.build-production: ng build --configuration=production && ng build --configuration=production-sl  && ng build --configuration=production-cs  && ng build --configuration=production-de && ng build --configuration=production-fr && ng build --configuration=production-it
scripts.build-staging: ng build --configuration=staging-en && ng build --configuration=staging-sl  && ng build --configuration=staging-cs  && ng build --configuration=staging-de && ng build --configuration=staging-fr && ng build --configuration=staging-it
scripts.build-production-amera: ng build --configuration=production-amera && ng build --configuration=production-sl-amera && ng build --configuration=production-cs-amera && ng build --configuration=production-de-amera && ng build --configuration=production-fr-amera && ng build --configuration=production-it-amera
scripts.build-production-ePointHES: ng build --configuration=production-ePointHES && ng build --configuration=production-sl-ePointHES && ng build --configuration=production-cs-ePointHES && ng build --configuration=production-de-ePointHES && ng build --configuration=production-fr-ePointHES && ng build --configuration=production-it-ePointHES
scripts.translation-sl: ng xi18n --output-path assets/i18n --i18n-locale sl && node node_modules/@ngx-translate/i18n-polyfill/extractor/ngx-extractor -i "src/app/**/**/*.ts" -f xlf -o src/assets/i18n/messages.xlf && ng run myGrid:xliffmerge:slovenian
scripts.translation-en: ng xi18n --output-path assets/i18n --i18n-locale en && node node_modules/@ngx-translate/i18n-polyfill/extractor/ngx-extractor -i "src/app/**/**/*.ts" -f xlf -o src/assets/i18n/messages.xlf && ng run myGrid:xliffmerge:english
scripts.translation-cs: ng xi18n --output-path assets/i18n --i18n-locale cs && node node_modules/@ngx-translate/i18n-polyfill/extractor/ngx-extractor -i "src/app/**/**/*.ts" -f xlf -o src/assets/i18n/messages.xlf && ng run myGrid:xliffmerge:czech
scripts.translation-de: ng xi18n --output-path assets/i18n --i18n-locale de && node node_modules/@ngx-translate/i18n-polyfill/extractor/ngx-extractor -i "src/app/**/**/*.ts" -f xlf -o src/assets/i18n/messages.xlf && ng run myGrid:xliffmerge:deutch
scripts.translation-fr: ng xi18n --output-path assets/i18n --i18n-locale fr && node node_modules/@ngx-translate/i18n-polyfill/extractor/ngx-extractor -i "src/app/**/**/*.ts" -f xlf -o src/assets/i18n/messages.xlf && ng run myGrid:xliffmerge:french
scripts.translation-it: ng xi18n --output-path assets/i18n --i18n-locale it && node node_modules/@ngx-translate/i18n-polyfill/extractor/ngx-extractor -i "src/app/**/**/*.ts" -f xlf -o src/assets/i18n/messages.xlf && ng run myGrid:xliffmerge:italian
